title: SmallCap email
content: Almost everyday I have to sift through “SmallCap” emails. **I** think they are about fonts, but they are of course about small cap stocks. Darn those dastardly spammers! They can’t trick me with their tricky font masquerades.
author: mica

comments.content:
Hah, Yea. :)

I know these.  
Seen them; Thought ’Type’; Found stocks; Deleted them. :)  
I am getting ’quite a few’ of them, as well.

_( Plus, All those ’Get A New Logo’ messages. :) Maybe those spammers should check what I DO, before sending me those ’offers’. )_
